words.def: the 20th letter of the Hebrew alphabet
a very light colorless element that is one of the six inert gasses
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a widely distributed system consisting of all the cells able to ingest bacteria or colloidal particles etc, except for certain white blood cells
a very light colorless element that is one of the six inert gasses
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a radioactive transuranic element produced by bombarding plutonium with neutrons
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
